SEARCH
Package com.example.lotteryevent

Class NotificationCustomManager

java.lang.Object
com.example.lotteryevent.NotificationCustomManager
public class NotificationCustomManager extends Object
A class that provides management of notifications including sending notifications, by creating notification documents under a given user's notification collection in Firebase, setting up a notification channel, and generating notifications to be displayed to the user.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    NotificationCustomManager(android.content.Context context)
    Sets up manager instance and creates notification channel

      public void clearNotifications()
      Removes all notifications from the shade

    • sendNotification

      public void sendNotification(String uid, String title, String message, String type, String eventId, String eventName, String organizerId, String organizerName)
      Sends notification to the specified user by creating a notification document under the user's notification collection.
      Parameters:
      uid - User ID of the user the notif is directed to
      title - Title of the notification
      message - Message content
      eventId - Event ID that the notif relates to
      eventName - Event name that the notif relates to
      organizerId - Organizer ID who sent the notif
      organizerName - Organizer Name who sent the notif

    • generateNotification

      public void generateNotification(String title, String message, String eventId, String notificationId, String notifType)
      Creates the actual notification in the target user's device with intent on where it will navigate to
      Parameters:
      title - title of the notif
      message - message of the notif
      eventId - event id that notif comes from
      notificationId - notif id
      notifType - notif type

    • checkAndDisplayUnreadNotifications

      public void checkAndDisplayUnreadNotifications(String uid)
      Checks db for unread notifs once and either geneerates one notif if only one or a bulk notif of a number of unread notifs
      Parameters:
      uid - recipient user's id

      public void listenForNotifications(String uid)
